simpletrims.noQuietReloadMessage: Client Config has Quiet Reloading disabled, however the server sent things to be reloaded. Please reload resources (F3+T) to see changes!
simpletrims.whyQuietReloadBad: You can enable Quiet Reloading at the config (simple_trims_client.json), however this is currently not recommended as it can cause many mod conflicts.
